overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Friday Intelligence Inc. is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our voice assistant service.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of information:
dataCollection.voiceData: Voice recordings and transcriptions for processing your requests
dataCollection.conversationHistory: Chat history to provide context for conversations
dataCollection.technicalData: Device information, IP address, and usage analytics
dataCollection.authData: Authentication information from your Google account

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.providingServices: Provide and improve our voice assistant services
dataUsage.improvingAccuracy: Improve speech recognition and response accuracy
dataUsage.troubleshooting: Troubleshoot issues and provide customer support

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We may share your information with:
dataSharing.aiProviders: Third-party AI service providers (Groq, ElevenLabs, Cartesia) for processing
dataSharing.serviceProviders: Service providers who assist in operating our service
dataSharing.legalRequirements: Law enforcement or regulatory authorities when required by law

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. You can request deletion of your data at any time.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.dataPortability: Export your data in a portable format

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@friday-inc.com
